headline: PPG earns top ‘AAA’ sustainability rating from MSCI for second consecutive year
summary: PITTSBURGH, November 19, 2025--PPG (NYSE:PPG) today announced that it has received the highest "AAA" rating for the second consecutive year from the Morgan Stanley Capital International (MSCI) ESG ratings assessment, denoting PPG as a "leader."

headline: Axalta And Akzo Nobel Merger - Painting A Mixed Picture
summary: Axalta and Akzo Nobel merge to form the world's #2 coatings firm. Learn what this means for investors and if synergy goals make it a smart move.
